item.title: How this Middle East oil giant got a nuclear big brother — and why your portfolio will feel the heat
item.description: Middle East oil giant just got a nuclear big brother — and your portfolio will feel the heat.

item.title: Furloughed by the government shutdown? Take these 4 steps to protect your financial future.
item.description: As the government shutdown drags on, hundreds of thousands of federal workers are bracing for their first missed paycheck on Friday.

item.title: ‘Be more concerned with outliving inflation than Social Security’: I went back to work at 61. I’m now 66. Was I right?
item.description: “I live frugally. I’ve owned my home free and clear since 2008.”

item.title: I’m 66. My mortgage is $250K and the rate is 3.4%. Would it be foolish to pay it off from my $770K investments?
item.description: “I don’t plan on taking Social Security until 70 and I will have one other small pension.”

item.title: I inherited a $30K trust. My bank says I’ll pay $10K in taxes if I cash out. Something is not right.
item.description: “The question is whether to take the cash or leave it to be managed by the bank.”
